name: Yuvraj Midha
reviews:
Nice building with nearly all the facilities. It is a 3-floor building and is attached with the Sankalp building which is the corporate office of Allen Career Institute. Batches of IIT Students mostly run here.  Classrooms are large enough so that many students can easily sit in it. Staircase model benches are available in the classroom. They are also well furnished with air conditioner & proper lightning. Washrooms are also neat and clean.
BUT IT SHOULD IMPROVE
